title: Attack on Titan
synopsis: After humanity is nearly wiped out by man-eating Titans, survivors live within massive walled cities. Eren Yeager vows to eradicate them after witnessing tragedy.

title: Death Note
synopsis: A high school student discovers a mysterious notebook that grants him the power to kill anyone by writing their name, leading to a deadly game of cat and mouse.

title: Naruto
synopsis: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja with a sealed demon fox spirit, dreams of becoming the strongest ninja and gaining recognition from his peers.

title: One Piece
synopsis: Monkey D. Luffy sets sail with his pirate crew in search of the legendary treasure One Piece to become the Pirate King.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
synopsis: Two brothers use alchemy in their quest to restore their bodies after a failed ritual, uncovering dark truths about their world.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
synopsis: After his family is slaughtered by demons, Tanjiro Kamado joins the Demon Slayer Corps to avenge them and cure his sister who was turned into a demon.
